properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 12:22PM CST until January 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Tombigbee River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River near Amory
* from Saturday January 11 until Monday January 13.
* At 12 PM Friday the stage was 12.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 23.4 feet on Sunday January 12.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Saturday January 11 and
continue to rise to near 23.4 feet by Sunday January 12.The river
will fall below flood stage by Monday January 13.
* At 23.0 feet...Most lowland and farm land near the river is
flooded. Equipment and livestock may need to be moved to higher
ground.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
